version_description:
Accompanying the implementation of the furniture item “mannequin”, an additional category has been added in the market board to view the prices and pending sales specifically for the mannequin.
Other minor issues have been addressed.

■Added the following features:
・The Alarm feature has been added to Events.
・In App Settings, it is now possible to edit the start time of alarms set for Event alerts related to Hosting and Invited events

■Addressed the following issues:
・Items purchased from the Market Board using "Buy" could not be immediately put up for sale again.
・Controls would freeze if a server connection error message was displayed while typing in chat.
・Other various minor issues

■The following functions have been added to the application.
・Items are now searchable by name when purchasing from all Market Board listings.
・Collectable items are now displayed with an icon signifying them as a Collectable.
・Notification settings can now be changed when using the group chat feature for the first time.

■The following issues have been resolved.
・Able to sell Collectable items.
* On Oct. 16, 2018, we had implemented a temporary measure to prevent Collectables from being from being sold by causing an error to display when attempting to sell Collectables. We have now corrected it in a way where the action of selling Collectables is no longer possible.
・Other minor issues have been addressed.

■The following features were added.
・Made it so that the device will vibrate and an alert will sound when a message is received while the chat room is displayed. It is possible to adjust the ON/OFF setting for the vibration and the alert within the app.
*The vibration feature only works with devices that can vibrate.

■Addressed the following issue(s):
・Minor issues were addressed.

■The following features have been added to the app.
- The Market Board can now be viewed when your character is logged in game.
- The equipped items on the character and retainer(s) can now be viewed in the Armoury Chest.
- Your Character Info can now be viewed from the Home Screen Sidebar Menu.
- The Lodestone link has been added within the Character Info.
- The app icon will now appear with badges.

■Minor issues have been addressed.

■The following features have been added to the app:
・Manually update added in Application Setting.
・Sync Schedule content with iOS calendar can now be set from the Application Setting.

■Addressed the following issues:
・The notification badges on the app icon and Home Screen for Chat will sometimes disappear under certain circumstances.
・Minor issues were addressed.

■ The following functions were added:
・URL's in chat messages are now clickable and will open a browser window. This behaviour can be turned on or off via the settings.
・Link to Eorzea Database has been added to the home menu.
・You can now set images, which are saved on the phone, as the background of the chat screen. You can set the background from "chat menu".

■ Minor bugs have been fixed.

■New features:
•You can now receive Lodestone news notifications (Settings can be changed in App Settings)
•Some item & market board functions will not be available during a World Visit.
•In-game login status now displayed on Home Screen.

■ Minor bugs have been fixed.

■ Updated the app along with the release of FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers.

■ New features:
・You can now send Stamp in Chat.
・You can now add favourite character in Address Book.
Long-press the character to add the character as favourite.

■ Minor bugs have been fixed

■Functions added:
・A long press menu for items. You can now check if you own a given item, and copy its name and info to the clipboard.
・You can now create recurring schedules.
・You can now change the app display theme.

■Minor bugs fixed.

■Added the following function(s):
- Automatically stacks items purchased from the market board for items that can be stacked, and already in your inventory.
- You can make your online status available in contacts list or chat rooms.
* Online status visibility setting can be changed in settings menu.

■Addressed minor issues.

■ Die folgenden Fehler wurden behoben:
・In iOS 13, kann es vorkommen, dass die App abstürzt, wenn man den Mogrz-Münzen-Markt öffnet.

■Le problème suivant a été corrigé :
- Les objets peuvent désormais être ajoutés aux favoris du Tableau des ventes.
Les articles enregistrés seront affichés dans l'onglet Favoris du Tableau des ventes.

■ Correction de problèmes mineurs.
